item.title: [Delta] Adding Working Bank Deposit Box [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:


Okay so I never did find a tutorial on this maybe I just didn’t look hard enough but anyways here’s how to add it really short and simple,

Okay so first search for this in client.java (server sided of course):

public void openUpDepBox() { sendFrame248(4465, 197); resetItems(7423); IsBanking = true;

If you already have it good, if not look for this in client.java

public void sendInterface(String text){ Then add this under the bracket of that public void:

public void openUpDepBox() { sendFrame248(4465, 197); resetItems(7423); IsBanking = true; }
Okay now this part sendFrame248(4465, 197); Is the interface for the deposit box
and this part IsBanking = true; allows you to bank your items

Okay know search for this still in client.java if(objectID ==
under the last bracket add this:

if(objectID == 9398){ openUpDepBox(); }
the if(objectID == 9398){ is the object id of the bank deposit box and the openUpDepBox(); Basically just opens it so you can use the deposit box.

Well that’s basically it save it compile run server, hope I helped first tutorial by the way did this few minutes ago since I was waiting for some models to download and realized I haven’t seen a tutorial about this anyways the last part I made (nothing special really) since the first part I happened to stumble upon in client.java, if I did something wrong please let me know, any questions just ask and I’ll try and answer.

Picture:

BankDepositBox.png765×502

Credits:
.01 to me for making this
99.99 to delta for the source

Read full topic
